oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Indian Creek Missionary Baptist Church: grave marker 5
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Indian Creek Missionary Baptist Church and Cemetery
Color photograph of a weathered headstone with a Union shield outline that text that reads in part "Martin McClarren; CO.A."

Indian Creek Missionary Baptist Church is a Reconstruction-era church. Date unknown. The cemetery is on a steep hillside and contains graves of U.S. Colored Troops veterans, among several other 19th century burials.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Graveposts; United States. Colored Troops
Churches
